newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil to hold news conference on March trade gap.
newsitem.headline: Brazil to hold news conference on March trade gap.

text.p: Brazil's Ministry of Industry and Commerce will hold a news conference on March's $1.026 billion trade gap at 1430 local time/1330 EDT/1730 GMT Tuesday, a spokeswoman said.
The spokeswoman said foreign trade secretary Mauricio Cortes and the Finance Ministry's economic policy secretary Jose Roberto Mendonca de Barros would brief journalists.
She added that trade data for the first week of April would also be announced.
